name: php-phan-vscode
description: Phan - static analyzer for PHP minimizing false positives
author: Tyson Andre <tysonandre775@hotmail.com>

phan.phpExecutablePath.description: The path to a PHP 7.1+ executable to use for Phan.

phan.phanScriptPath.description: The path to the phan script to use (using a phan branch supporting the Language Server Protocol). e.g. /path/to/vendor/phan/phan/phan. In the future, this will be optional.

phan.analyzedProjectDirectory.description: The path to the project folder which phan will analyze. `.phan` must be a folder within that directory. (In the future, this VS Code extension may support analyzing more than one project)

phan.enableDebugLog.description: Set this to true to print messages to the debug console when developing or debugging this VS Code extension.

phan.analyzedFileExtensions.description: A list of file extensions to request phan to analyze. By default, this only includes 'php'. This may need to be synchronized with .phan/config.php's 'analyze_file_extensions'
